QuestData.Title: Secrets Revealed
QuestData.Description: There is a shaman here, Thoralius, who might be able to aid us. He is a friend of Gryan's who has recently come to Westfall to study the elemental devastation that has befallen us.$B$BSpeak to Thoralius and see if there is something that he can do to shed some light on the identity of this shadowy figure.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Thoralius the Wise at Moonbrook in Westfall.
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm, yes, perhaps I could be of some assistance. When I was in Northrend I helped the people of Valgarde uncover some of the mysteries of the vrykul by delving into the spirit world. Perhaps the same could be done here.
